BIO

I am a programmer and front end developer with a passion for creating engaging and user-friendly applications. In my academic years, I learned the latest technologies and best practices in web development, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React and Firebase. I am also very proficient in Java language and have used it to develop various projects during my academic years. You can find the links to these projects on My Work section and see how I applied my skills and knowledge to solve real-world problems. I am always eager to learn new things and improve my craft as a developer. I am looking for opportunities to join a team of professionals who share my enthusiasm and vision for building amazing applications.
